name: The Warriors Quest
description:
A Warrior from a far away land is on the Quest to slay the monsters hidden within a strange towns walls. Many monsters have been sighted in the area and extreme caution is needed for this Quest. Even the villagers are acting weird, and do not take kindly to strangers in their town. It's almost like they are protecting the monsters, or maybe protecting everyone else from what's inside this monstrous place.

Controls

A/ D - Player Movement (Left/Right)

Spacebar - Jump

Shift - Run

F - Slash
